Actions.Name: Create an item
Actions.Description: Create an item on a chosen Table.

Actions.Name: Get a page of items for a Table
Actions.Description: Gets a page of up to 250 items from a Table in your RAPID site.

Actions.Name: Get a inherit links list for a given item
Actions.Description: Gets a list of items that expect to be linked to the current item due to the inherit link configuration on your RAPID site.

Actions.Name: Get an item
Actions.Description: Fetches a specific item from a Table on your RAPID site. This will always return the full item profile of the fetched item.

Actions.Name: When something happens to an item in your RAPID site
Actions.Description: Creates a webhook for when something happens in your RAPID site.

Actions.Name: Add an attachment record to an item in your RAPID site
Actions.Description: Adds an attachment record to an item in your RAPID site. This record refers to the location of a file stored in SharePoint.
